Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled performance, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. We believe it's worth more than just $12000, but considering your unique position and potential, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at an introductory price of $15000. This special offer is not only a testament to our confidence in its value but also a chance for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our product. If you're interested, please let me know, and we'll proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
